SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID, A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID, B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM, A.BACKUP_FILE, B.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY, B.BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT A, COMTNBACKUPOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = B.BACKUP_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076'
A.STTUS = #sttus#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) >= #searchKeywordFrom#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) <= #searchKeywordTo#
B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%'
A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%'
ORDER BY A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID DESC ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT A, COMTNBACKUPOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = B.BACKUP_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076'
A.STTUS = #sttus#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) >= #searchKeywordFrom#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) <= #searchKeywordTo#
B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%'
A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%'

SELECT A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID, A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID, B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM, A.BACKUP_FILE, B.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY, B.BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT A, COMTNBACKUPOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = B.BACKUP_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076' AND A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #backupResultId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBACKUPRESULT ( BACKUP_RESULT_ID, BACKUP_OPERT_ID, BACKUP_FILE, STTUS, ERROR_INFO, EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, EXECUT_END_TM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #backupResultId#, #backupOpertId#, #backupFile#, #sttus#, #errorInfo#, #executBeginTime#, #executEndTime#, #lastUpdusrId#, SYSDATETIME, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNBACKUPRESULT SET BACKUP_FILE = #backupFile#, ERROR_INFO = #errorInfo#, STTUS = #sttus#, EXECUT_END_TM = #executEndTime#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #backupResultId#
